summary: The 100 Barbarian Sons of Krull get attacked by a superior force and captured. It's up to the young, weak but smart Ronal to free them. 3 join his dangerous quest.
cast: Anders Juul|Hadi Ka-Koush|Lærke Winther|Brian Lykke|Lars Mikkelsen|Peter Aude|Lars Bom|Sven-Ole Thorsen|Ole Thestrup|Preben Kristensen|Ole Ernst|Brigitte Nielsen|Jesper Binzer|Allan Olsen|Jens Jacob Tychsen|Bodil Jørgensen|Szhirley|Michael Frandsen|Niels Rahr|Jan Duckert|Bjarne Spellerberg Orfelt|Henrik Juul|Zdenko Santini|Anders Brogaard Jepsen|Mads Buch|Adam Jala Alaldi|Tobias Gundorff Boesen|Thorbjørn Christoffersen|Philip Einstein Lipski|Eddy May|Maria Biilmann|Mette-Marie Trier|Josefine Stork Jangaard|Isabella Munk Billing|Josephine Poulsen|Liva Prescott|Amira Høgh Daimar|Katja Byskov Mønsted|Mette Meyer-Zeuthen|Martin Preisler|Ashley Acarino|De'Adre Aziza|Ben Bledsoe|Pierce Cravens|Louis Lombardi|Scott Rayow|Dee Snider|Oliver Vaquer|Watt White

title: Ronal Barbaren
